slts.slt: I can mint an Andamio Learner Token.
I can commit to an Assignment.
I can see an on-chain record of my completed Assignment.
I know the roles participants can play in Andamio.
I know where to learn more about Andamio.
I can leave a comment on the Andamio whitepaper.
I can participate in the Andamio Community.

modules.title: Contribution and Treasury Management in Andamio

slts.slt: I can mint a Contributor Token in Andamio.
I can commit to a Project in Andamio.
I can view prerequisites for Learners and Contributors in Andamio.
I can write a Student Learning Target.
I can use potential Assignments to write supporting SLTs.
I can organize Student Learning Targets into Course Modules.
I can write and publish a PBL Course Contract.
